Name: “Veteran’s Day”: Vocalist Must be Over 50 Years of Age on the Release Date
Description: This round brought to you by Sparkles.

Name: Submit the perfect soundtrack for this clip
Description:
We found a short video clip: https://www.pexels.com/video/a-herd-of-horses-walking-across-a-river-18853626/

Your job is to give it the perfect soundtrack.
Submit the song that should play during this “scene”

In your comments, feel free to:
• Add timestamps to match your music to the clip
• Add your own context for the scene
• Explain what happens before or after if your song runs longer (Obviously, it’s a short clip, so have fun filling in the story.)

Name: You Probably Haven’t Heard of Them: Metal Edition
Description:
Max monthly listeners: 1 million

This is a little trial balloon for our upcoming “OOPS All ‘You Probably Haven’t Heard of Them’” season (Season 27). A light theme with a listener cap.

You can submit any song that falls under a metal genre. And of course, good songs only.

Max monthly listeners: 1 million

Name: A band you needed to hear when you saw the band name
